languages.text: The wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} if their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} is less than 35.

languages.text: 如果装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}低于35，则获得+5{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}。
